text: Selwa Carmen Showker “Lucky” Roosevelt (born January 13, 1929) is a retired- American civil servant. She served as Chief of Protocol of the United States for almost seven years from 1982 through 1989 during the Ronald Reagan presidency. She was married to, Archibald Bulloch Roosevelt, Jr., the grandson of President Theodore Roosevelt. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American civil servants Category:Politicians from Tennessee
title: Selwa Roosevelt
